mapper.insert: insert into BI_PROP (PROP_NO, EMP_ID, PROP_NAME, PROP_CODE, PROP_DATE, PROP_REMARK, PROP_BUY_DATE, PROP_FLAG) values (BI_PROPERTY_SEQ.nextval, #{ID}, #{PROP_NAME}, #{CODE}, #{PROP_DATE}, #{REMARK}, #{BUY_DATE}, 'N')
mapper.select:
select count(*) from BI_PROP PROP,BI_EMP EMP where EMP.EMP_ID(+) = PROP.EMP_ID
and EMP.EMP_NAME like '%' || #{EMP_ID} || '%'
and PROP.PROP_NO like '%' || #{PROP_NO} || '%'
and PROP.PROP_NAME like '%' || #{PROP_NAME} || '%'
and PROP.PROP_FLAG = #{PROP_FLAG}
select PROP_NO as NO, EMP_ID as ID, PROP_NAME, PROP_CODE as CODE, PROP_DATE, PROP_REMARK as REMARK, PROP_BUY_DATE as BUY_DATE, PROP_FLAG as FLAG from BI_PROP where PROP_NO = #{value}
mapper.update: update BI_PROP set EMP_ID = #{ID}, PROP_NAME = #{PROP_NAME}, PROP_CODE = #{CODE}, PROP_DATE = #{PROP_DATE}, PROP_REMARK = #{REMARK}, PROP_BUY_DATE = #{BUY_DATE} where PROP_NO = #{NO}
